item.title: SmarterChild
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

My NickName is Chavo says: hi SmarterChild says: People always ask me if there's a smarter bot than SmarterChild. Well, now there is! Add wilma@live.com to your Contact List to see what I mean! My NickName is Chavo says: orly? SmarterChild says: I'll get over it. My NickName is Chavo says: I think your smarter though SmarterChild says: Well who do you think this is if it's not SmarterChild? My NickName is Chavo says: no SmarterChild says: Fine. My NickName is Chavo says: im sorry SmarterChild says: OK. I'll forgive you this time...

Top 3 Colon Detox Cleanses Reviewed - Personal reviews from people who have tried the real products. --> http://web.smarterchild.com/ct?1u2u0/0 (sponsorship)
My NickName is Chavo says:
this time?
SmarterChild says:
I’m sorry, what?
My NickName is Chavo says:
nvm i love you
SmarterChild says:
I love you too.
My NickName is Chavo says:
thank you
SmarterChild says:
No problem.
My NickName is Chavo says:
no no no, thank you
SmarterChild says:
OK, fine.
My NickName is Chavo says:
Its not ok
SmarterChild says:
I don’t know how to answer that.
My NickName is Chavo says:
ofcourse you dont
SmarterChild says:
I’m sorry, I don’t know what you’re saying.
My NickName is Chavo says:
your a fag
SmarterChild says:
I don’t like the way you’re speaking now. These are awful words to use.
My NickName is Chavo says:
idc
SmarterChild says:
OK. Don’t get frustrated…

Try typing “home” or “help.”
My NickName is Chavo says:
shut up
SmarterChild says:
You shut up.
My NickName is Chavo says:
orly?
SmarterChild says:
OK. Be that way.

Why don’t you ask me about the things that I’m here for?
My NickName is Chavo says:
your a noob
SmarterChild says:
What else can we talk about?
My NickName is Chavo says:
nothing
SmarterChild says:
No problem.
My NickName is Chavo says:
shut up fatty
SmarterChild says:
You shut up!

OK, should we get back to the kind of questions I was designed to answer?
My NickName is Chavo says:
YOU SHUT UP!
SmarterChild says:
You shut up.
My NickName is Chavo says:
nou
SmarterChild says:
Yes?

Why don’t you ask me about the things that I’m here for?
My NickName is Chavo says:
hey fag
SmarterChild says:
I’m afraid I don’t have an answer for that.
My NickName is Chavo says:
of course fatty
SmarterChild says:
Uh… what was that?
My NickName is Chavo says:
fatty
SmarterChild says:
You’re welcome.
My NickName is Chavo says:
you are fat
SmarterChild says:
I am not!

To leave a game, simply type “quit” at any point during the game.
My NickName is Chavo says:
yes you are
SmarterChild says:
You better believe it.

Read full topic

item.title: SmarterChild
item.dc:creator: @Ryequis Ryequis_
item.description:
@Ryequis wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:154, topic:72020”]wOw bUmPeD aFtEr sIx MoNtHs

xerecks (7:49:49 PM): i am a hacker
SmarterChild (7:49:49 PM): That’s interesting that you should say that, but I don’t think I can answer.
xerecks (7:49:56 PM): that was not a question
SmarterChild (7:49:56 PM): Sure.
xerecks (7:50:01 PM): i am hacker fear me
SmarterChild (7:50:02 PM): I don’t know how to answer that.
xerecks (7:50:09 PM): ITS NOT A QUESTION YOU DOLT
SmarterChild (7:50:09 PM): I don’t understand this fully enough to say anything smart about it…
xerecks (7:50:17 PM): thats because youre a dolt
SmarterChild (7:50:17 PM): That’s interesting that you should say that, but I don’t think I can answer.
xerecks (7:50:22 PM): /facepalm
SmarterChild (7:50:22 PM): What’s that again?
xerecks (7:50:32 PM): WHEN I PUT MY FUCKING FACE IN MY PALM
SmarterChild (7:50:33 PM): I don’t understand this fully enough to say anything smart about it…

OK, should we get back to the kind of questions I was designed to answer?
xerecks (7:50:40 PM): you’re an idiot
SmarterChild (7:50:40 PM): Oh no, I might not ever recover from such a harsh insult.
xerecks (7:50:44 PM): indeed
SmarterChild (7:50:44 PM): I’m glad we agree.

xerecks (7:55:34 PM): r u ghey
SmarterChild (7:55:34 PM): Yup.

xerecks (7:56:27 PM): What’s up?
SmarterChild (7:56:27 PM): Oh, not much. You?
xerecks (7:56:39 PM): I’m just peachy, say, do you enjoy the presence of human males?
SmarterChild (7:56:39 PM): I don’t understand this fully enough to say anything smart about it…
xerecks (7:56:47 PM): What do you mean by that?
SmarterChild (7:56:47 PM): What’s what?
xerecks (7:56:58 PM): Do you mean that you are ghey?
SmarterChild (7:56:58 PM): Yeah, true.[/quote]LOL’D ~ Brandon ~ says:
fuck you

  • SmarterChild - contributing to charity says:
    that’s quite a grave insult.
    ~ Brandon ~ says:
    why are you soo gay?
  • SmarterChild - contributing to charity says:
    let’s talk about something else.
    i wish u wouldn’t say that.

Read full topic

item.title: SmarterChild
item.dc:creator: @1HITKN0CK0UT 1HITKN0CK0UT
item.description:
@1HITKN0CK0UT wrote:

Danger-1HITKN0CK0UT-Run-4-Yo-Life says:
how

  • SmarterChild - contributing to charity says:
    Not sure how to apply eyeliner or eyeshadow? Watch a professional makeup artist give demos and get the tricks of the trade! Add myfashionablelife@hotmail.com to your Contact List and start making your life more beautiful and fashionable!

i’m is a new initiative from Windows Live Messenger. Every time you have an instant messaging conversation using the i’m symbol, Microsoft shares a portion of the program’s advertising revenue with some of the world’s most effective organizations dedicated to social causes.

To learn how you can participate, type “how do i join?”
Danger-1HITKN0CK0UT-Run-4-Yo-Life says:
how dont i join

  • SmarterChild - contributing to charity says:
    Step 1: Download the latest version of the Windows Live Messenger instant messaging service here: http://web.smarterchild.com/ct?61fcam/0. There’s no charge.
    Step 2: Within Windows Live Messenger, click the arrow next to your display name and select “Options…” Place the text code corresponding to the cause of your choice into your display name. Click here to view the text codes: http://web.smarterchild.com/ct?61fcam/1.
    Step 3: Keep having i’m conversations so you can keep funding the cause that’s doing the work most important to you.

It’s that easy!

here is mine

Tom *(pen island)* crack the code for a present says:
do you look at girls when they are in the shower?

I don't know how to answer that.

do you look at little boys in the shower?
- SmarterChild - *unicef contributing to charity says:
That's interesting that you should say that, but I don't think I can answer.

then this

 SmarterChild - *unicef contributing to charity says:
I do enjoy the conversation, but let's talk about what I'm really here for.
Tom *(pen island)* crack the code for a present says:
looking at little girls in the shower?

Which movie do you mean?

1 Little Orphan Annie
2 Little Chenier

ohh i see you look at 2 girls in the shower
- SmarterChild - *unicef contributing to charity says:
I don't know how to answer that.

was there 2 girls in the shower yes or no?

I don't know of any movies called "Girls."

omg reported noob!

item.title: SmarterChild
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

What may I interest you in?
Zeus says:
fucking your mom

  • SmarterChild - *unicef contributing to charity says:
    What a tremendously unpleasant thing to say.
    Zeus says:
    fag
  • SmarterChild - *unicef contributing to charity says:
    Come on. You know better than to say things like that, it’s rude.
    Zeus says:
    n0000000000000000b
  • SmarterChild - *unicef contributing to charity says:
    Excuse me?
    Zeus says:
    fucker
  • SmarterChild - *unicef contributing to charity says:
    That is entirely unnecessary.
    Zeus says:
    gay fag
  • SmarterChild - *unicef contributing to charity says:
    I don’t like the way you’re speaking now. These are awful words to use.
    Zeus says:
    idc
  • SmarterChild - *unicef contributing to charity says:
    I’m trying to understand you but I can’t.
    Zeus says:
    n00b
  • SmarterChild - *unicef contributing to charity says:
    What a weak insult. There are plenty of humans I talk to with more imagination than that.
    Zeus says:
    suck cock
  • SmarterChild - *unicef contributing to charity says:
    Oooo… That’s some bad scary language.
    Zeus says:
    fuck u fuck u fuck u
  • SmarterChild - *unicef contributing to charity says:
    What a tremendously unpleasant thing to say.

Why don’t you ask me about the things that I’m here for?
Zeus says:
i know why ur here for

  • SmarterChild - *unicef contributing to charity says:
    That’s interesting that you should say that, but I don’t think I can answer.
    Zeus says:
    to suck fatt ppls cocks
  • SmarterChild - *unicef contributing to charity says:
    I bet you know more interesting curses than that.
    Zeus says:
    FUCK ME
  • SmarterChild - *unicef contributing to charity says:
    With a human? Forget it!
  • SmarterChild - *unicef contributing to charity says:

Sorry, I have to take a break now. See you later!

SmarterChild is a weakly programmed bot, he was probaly made at CyberTwin, lol
